name: GentleFeet Playground Platforming Edition
description: Are you blessed with footfetish and love for giant girls? Do you like 2D platformers? Than try out this game which is essentially giantess game that plays like a 2D arcade platformer. Pick one of 5 tinies and one of 7 giantess' and try to collect crystals before she squeezes you to the ground! The game also contains a score system and several visual novel-like scenes.
